title: The Fight For The North (with Joe Twyman)
itunes:title: The Fight For The North (with Joe Twyman)
description:
Deltapoll Co-Founder Joe Twyman tells Bloomberg's Caroline Hepker and Sebastian Salek why the Tories are polling high despite Boris Johnson's falling personal ratings. Robert Craig, who teaches public law at the London School of Economics, talks through the possible cracks in the Benn Act.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
